com.cypher.breadmote

Interface ErrorListener


  • public interface ErrorListener
    Used to actively listen to errors while connected to a device
    See Also:
    Connection.addListener(ErrorListener), Connection.removeListener(ErrorListener)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onError(Error error)
      Called when a new error is generated, either by the BreadMote SDK or the connected device
      void onErrorRemoved(int index)
      Called when an error is removed
      void setErrors(java.util.List<Error> errors)
      Called when the error log has been cleared or when the listener is first added

    • Method Detail

      • onError

        void onError(Error error)
        Called when a new error is generated, either by the BreadMote SDK or the connected device
        Parameters:
        error - The newly generated error. Note: The error is automatically appeneded to the list of errors

      • onErrorRemoved

        void onErrorRemoved(int index)
        Called when an error is removed
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the error removed. Note: The error no longer exists in the list of errors
        See Also:
        Connection.removeError(int)

      • setErrors

        void setErrors(java.util.List<Error> errors)
        Called when the error log has been cleared or when the listener is first added
        Parameters:
        errors - The current list of errors. This collection cannot be modified
        See Also:
        Connection.clearErrors()
